scripts.compile:es5: npm run copyJSON && tsc --project tsconfig.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile:es5-with-xpath: npm run copyJSON && npm run compile:xpath && tsc --project tsconfig.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile:es51: tsc --project tsconfig.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile:xpathts: pegjs src/topublish/rx-sax/XPathParser.pegjs && mv src/topublish/rx-sax/XPathParser.js src/topublish/rx-sax/XPathParser.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile:xpath: mkdir -p lib/topublish/rx-sax && touch lib/topublish/rx-sax/XPathParser.js && rm lib/topublish/rx-sax/XPathParser.js && pegjs -o lib/topublish/rx-sax/XPathParser.js src/topublish/rx-sax/XPathParser.pegjs && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.copyJSON: cp src/*.json lib/ && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.prepare: npm run compile:xsd && npm run compile:es5
scripts.test: echo 'Get more/better tests working, please!' && bin/gpml2pvjson --id http://identifiers.org/wikipathways/WP554 < ./test/input/WP554_77712.gpml
